metadata {
// Automatically generated. Make future change here.
definition (name: "Entry Door", author: "ethomasii@gmail.com") {
capability "Contact Sensor"
capability "Sensor"

	command "open"
	command "closed"
}

simulator {
	status "open": "zone report :: type: 19 value: 0031"
	status "closed": "zone report :: type: 19 value: 0030"
}

tiles {
	standardTile("contact", "device.contact", width: 2, height: 2) {
		state("open", label:'Entry Doors\n${name}', action: "contact.open", icon:"st.contact.contact.open", backgroundColor:"#ffa81e")
		state("closed", label:'Entry Doors\n${name}', action: "contact.closed", icon:"st.contact.contact.closed", backgroundColor:"#79b821")
	}

	main "contact"
	details(["contact"])
}
}

def parse(String description) {
}

def open() {
log.debug "Door open detected"
// motionCmd(1)
sendEvent(name: "contact", value: "open")

}

def closed() {
log.debug "Door closed detected"
// motionCmd(0)
sendEvent(name: "contact", value: "closed")
}
